an3.61:1.1: “Tinimani, bhikkhave, titthayatanani yani panditehi samanuyunjiyamanani samanugahiyamanani samanubhasiyamanani parampi gantva akiriyaya santhahanti.
an3.61:1.3: Santi, bhikkhave, eke samanabrahmana evamvadino evamditthino:
an3.61:1.4: ‘yam kincayam purisapuggalo patisamvedeti sukham va dukkham va adukkhamasukham va sabbam tam pubbekatahetu’ti.
an3.61:1.5: Santi, bhikkhave, eke samanabrahmana evamvadino evamditthino:
an3.61:1.6: ‘yam kincayam purisapuggalo patisamvedeti sukham va dukkham va adukkhamasukham va sabbam tam issaranimmanahetu’ti.
an3.61:1.7: Santi, bhikkhave, eke samanabrahmana evamvadino evamditthino:
an3.61:1.8: ‘yam kincayam purisapuggalo patisamvedeti sukham va dukkham va adukkhamasukham va sabbam tam ahetuappaccaya’ti.
an3.61:2.1: Tatra, bhikkhave, ye te samanabrahmana evamvadino evamditthino:
an3.61:2.2: ‘yam kincayam purisapuggalo patisamvedeti sukham va dukkham va adukkhamasukham va sabbam tam pubbekatahetu’ti, tyaham upasankamitva evam vadami:
an3.61:2.4: “yam kincayam purisapuggalo patisamvedeti sukham va dukkham va adukkhamasukham va sabbam tam pubbekatahetu”’ti?
an3.61:2.5: Te ca me evam puttha ‘ama’ti patijananti.
an3.61:2.7: ‘tenahayasmanto panatipatino bhavissanti pubbekatahetu, adinnadayino bhavissanti pubbekatahetu, abrahmacarino bhavissanti pubbekatahetu, musavadino bhavissanti pubbekatahetu, pisunavaca bhavissanti pubbekatahetu, pharusavaca bhavissanti pubbekatahetu, samphappalapino bhavissanti pubbekatahetu, abhijjhaluno bhavissanti pubbekatahetu, byapannacitta bhavissanti pubbekatahetu, micchaditthika bhavissanti pubbekatahetu’.
an3.61:3.1: Pubbekatam kho pana, bhikkhave, sarato paccagacchatam na hoti chando va vayamo va idam va karaniyam idam va akaraniyanti.
an3.61:3.2: Iti karaniyakaraniye kho pana saccato thetato anupalabbhiyamane mutthassatinam anarakkhanam viharatam na hoti paccattam sahadhammiko samanavado.
an3.61:3.3: Ayam kho me, bhikkhave, tesu samanabrahmanesu evamvadisu evamditthisu pathamo sahadhammiko niggaho hoti.
an3.61:4.1: Tatra, bhikkhave, ye te samanabrahmana evamvadino evamditthino:
an3.61:4.2: ‘yam kincayam purisapuggalo patisamvedeti sukham va dukkham va adukkhamasukham va sabbam tam issaranimmanahetu’ti, tyaham upasankamitva evam vadami:
an3.61:4.4: yam kincayam purisapuggalo patisamvedeti sukham va dukkham va adukkhamasukham va sabbam tam issaranimmanahetu’ti?
an3.61:4.5: Te ca me evam puttha ‘ama’ti patijananti.
an3.61:4.7: ‘tenahayasmanto panatipatino bhavissanti issaranimmanahetu, adinnadayino bhavissanti issaranimmanahetu, abrahmacarino bhavissanti issaranimmanahetu, musavadino bhavissanti issaranimmanahetu, pisunavaca bhavissanti issaranimmanahetu, pharusavaca bhavissanti issaranimmanahetu, samphappalapino bhavissanti issaranimmanahetu, abhijjhaluno bhavissanti issaranimmanahetu, byapannacitta bhavissanti issaranimmanahetu, micchaditthika bhavissanti issaranimmanahetu’.
an3.61:5.1: Issaranimmanam kho pana, bhikkhave, sarato paccagacchatam na hoti chando va vayamo va idam va karaniyam idam va akaraniyanti.
an3.61:5.2: Iti karaniyakaraniye kho pana saccato thetato anupalabbhiyamane mutthassatinam anarakkhanam viharatam na hoti paccattam sahadhammiko samanavado.
an3.61:5.3: Ayam kho me, bhikkhave, tesu samanabrahmanesu evamvadisu evamditthisu dutiyo sahadhammiko niggaho hoti.
an3.61:6.1: Tatra, bhikkhave, ye te samanabrahmana evamvadino evamditthino:
an3.61:6.2: ‘yam kincayam purisapuggalo patisamvedeti sukham va dukkham va adukkhamasukham va sabbam tam ahetuappaccaya’ti, tyaham upasankamitva evam vadami:
an3.61:6.4: yam kincayam purisapuggalo patisamvedeti sukham va dukkham va adukkhamasukham va sabbam tam ahetuappaccaya’ti?
an3.61:6.5: Te ca me evam puttha ‘ama’ti patijananti.
an3.61:6.7: ‘tenahayasmanto panatipatino bhavissanti ahetuappaccaya …pe… micchaditthika bhavissanti ahetuappaccaya’”.
an3.61:7.1: Ahetuappaccayam kho pana, bhikkhave, sarato paccagacchatam na hoti chando va vayamo va idam va karaniyam idam va akaraniyanti.
an3.61:7.2: Iti karaniyakaraniye kho pana saccato thetato anupalabbhiyamane mutthassatinam anarakkhanam viharatam na hoti paccattam sahadhammiko samanavado.
an3.61:7.3: Ayam kho me, bhikkhave, tesu samanabrahmanesu evamvadisu evamditthisu tatiyo sahadhammiko niggaho hoti.
an3.61:8.1: Imani kho, bhikkhave, tini titthayatanani yani panditehi samanuyunjiyamanani samanugahiyamanani samanubhasiyamanani parampi gantva akiriyaya santhahanti.
an3.61:9.1: Ayam kho pana, bhikkhave, maya dhammo desito aniggahito asankilittho anupavajjo appatikuttho samanehi brahmanehi vinnuhi.
an3.61:9.2: Katamo ca, bhikkhave, maya dhammo desito aniggahito asankilittho anupavajjo appatikuttho samanehi brahmanehi vinnuhi?
an3.61:9.3: Ima cha dhatuyoti, bhikkhave, maya dhammo desito aniggahito asankilittho anupavajjo appatikuttho samanehi brahmanehi vinnuhi.
an3.61:9.4: Imani cha phassayatananiti, bhikkhave, maya dhammo desito aniggahito asankilittho anupavajjo appatikuttho samanehi brahmanehi vinnuhi.
an3.61:9.5: Ime attharasa manopavicarati, bhikkhave, maya dhammo desito aniggahito asankilittho anupavajjo appatikuttho samanehi brahmanehi vinnuhi.
an3.61:9.6: Imani cattari ariyasaccaniti, bhikkhave, maya dhammo desito aniggahito asankilittho anupavajjo appatikuttho samanehi brahmanehi vinnuhi.
an3.61:10.1: Ima cha dhatuyoti, bhikkhave, maya dhammo desito aniggahito asankilittho anupavajjo appatikuttho samanehi brahmanehi vinnuhiti.
an3.61:10.5: pathavidhatu, apodhatu, tejodhatu, vayodhatu, akasadhatu, vinnanadhatu.
an3.61:10.6: Ima cha dhatuyoti, bhikkhave, maya dhammo desito aniggahito asankilittho anupavajjo appatikuttho samanehi brahmanehi vinnuhiti.
an3.61:10.7: Iti yam tam vuttam, idametam paticca vuttam.
an3.61:11.1: Imani cha phassayatananiti, bhikkhave, maya dhammo desito aniggahito asankilittho anupavajjo appatikuttho samanehi brahmanehi vinnuhiti.
an3.61:11.5: cakkhu phassayatanam, sotam phassayatanam, ghanam phassayatanam, jivha phassayatanam, kayo phassayatanam, mano phassayatanam.
an3.61:11.6: Imani cha phassayatananiti, bhikkhave, maya dhammo desito aniggahito asankilittho anupavajjo appatikuttho samanehi brahmanehi vinnuhiti.
an3.61:11.7: Iti yam tam vuttam, idametam paticca vuttam.
an3.61:12.1: Ime attharasa manopavicarati, bhikkhave, maya dhammo desito aniggahito asankilittho anupavajjo appatikuttho samanehi brahmanehi vinnuhiti.
an3.61:12.4: Cakkhuna rupam disva somanassatthaniyam rupam upavicarati domanassatthaniyam rupam upavicarati upekkhatthaniyam rupam upavicarati,
an3.61:12.9: manasa dhammam vinnaya somanassatthaniyam dhammam upavicarati domanassatthaniyam dhammam upavicarati upekkhatthaniyam dhammam upavicarati.
an3.61:12.10: Ime attharasa manopavicarati, bhikkhave, maya dhammo desito aniggahito asankilittho anupavajjo appatikuttho samanehi brahmanehi vinnuhiti.
an3.61:12.11: Iti yam tam vuttam, idametam paticca vuttam.
an3.61:13.1: Imani cattari ariyasaccaniti, bhikkhave, maya dhammo desito aniggahito asankilittho anupavajjo appatikuttho samanehi brahmanehi vinnuhiti.
an3.61:13.4: Channam, bhikkhave, dhatunam upadaya gabbhassavakkanti hoti;
an3.61:13.5: okkantiya sati namarupam, namarupapaccaya salayatanam, salayatanapaccaya phasso, phassapaccaya vedana.
an3.61:13.6: Vediyamanassa kho panaham, bhikkhave, idam dukkhanti pannapemi, ayam dukkhasamudayoti pannapemi, ayam dukkhanirodhoti pannapemi, ayam dukkhanirodhagamini patipadati pannapemi.
an3.61:14.2: Jatipi dukkha, jarapi dukkha, (…) maranampi dukkham, sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupayasapi dukkha, appiyehi sampayogo dukkho, piyehi vippayogo dukkho, yampiccham na labhati tampi dukkham. Sankhittena pancupadanakkhandha dukkha.
an3.61:17.3: sammaditthi, sammasankappo, sammavaca, sammakammanto, sammaajivo, sammavayamo, sammasati, sammasamadhi.
an3.61:17.4: Idam vuccati, bhikkhave, dukkhanirodhagamini patipada ariyasaccam.
an3.61:17.5: ‘Imani cattari ariyasaccani’ti, bhikkhave, maya dhammo desito aniggahito asankilittho anupavajjo appatikuttho samanehi brahmanehi vinnuhiti.
an3.61:17.6: Iti yam tam vuttam idametam paticca vuttan”ti.
